Text:

Update the actual video is just barely watchable very fuzzy and the audio is from the cam with quite a bit of echo.

Sorry but the sample is much better than the actual video and truth be known the movie stopped being interesting about midway. I would give it about a 6 for total movie quality.
BTW thanks to BONE for the effort and the up, I will continue to seed to help those who wish to watch it anyway
